it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller

Class RoundController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller.RoundController

  • public class RoundController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller that handles all of the operations to complete the turn and pass to successive one.
    Author:
    Pietro L'Imperio.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Reference of the controller.
      private Game game
      Reference of the game.
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> scoreForPlayers
      List of score to attribute to each player in case of one or multiple deaths during the finished turn.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RoundController

        public RoundController(Controller controller,
                       Game game)
        Contructor that initializes the game and controller references.

    • Method Detail

      • updateTurn

        void updateTurn()
        Changes the player of the turn. Checks if is the last turn of the frenzy mode to call the end of the game. Sets correctly the number of maximum actions that a player can do in the next turn. Updates the decks of cards and ammo tile and restore the situation on the squares. Calls the methods to handle the deaths that have happened during the last turn, if there has been at least one.

      • randomSpawn

        void randomSpawn(Player player)
        Handles a random spawn to generate players that jump turn, or has been not connected during the moment when they have to decide power up to discard to be spawn. At the end send a map event and a player board event to notify to all the players the update.
        Parameters:
        player - Player that has to randomly spawn.

      • handleRespawnOfDeadPlayers

        private void handleRespawnOfDeadPlayers(java.util.ArrayList<Player> deadPlayers)
        Handles the respawn of dead players at the end of the turn.
        Parameters:
        deadPlayers - List of player died during the last turn.

      • updateDecksAndSquares

        private void updateDecksAndSquares()
        Updates the decks of ammo tile and power up cards if their size is lower than 3 and refill the square where the player of the last turn went to catch.

      • initializeNumOfKillDoneInTheTurn

        private void initializeNumOfKillDoneInTheTurn()
        Initializes the number of killings done during the turn.

      • updatePlayerOfTurn

        private void updatePlayerOfTurn()
        Updates the player of the turn, changing the value of the integer field in the game.

      • isFinishedTheLastFrenzyTurn

        private boolean isFinishedTheLastFrenzyTurn()
        Checks if the last turn of frenzy mode is finished or not.
        Returns:
        True if the finished turn was the last turn of frenzy mode, false otherwise.

      • countScoreForDeaths

        void countScoreForDeaths(java.util.ArrayList<Player> deadPlayers)
        Counts the score for the deaths happens during the turn, sending the update of the score
        Parameters:
        deadPlayers - The list of the player died during the last turn.

      • updatePlayerBoardForFrenzyMode

        private void updatePlayerBoardForFrenzyMode()
        Changes the player board of the players to pass in frenzy mode, or only tha action bar in the case the player has still some damage.

      • sendUpdateOfScore

        private void sendUpdateOfScore(boolean finalUpdate,
                               boolean isForDisconnectionOfThirdPlayer)
        Sends a message with the update of the score due to the death, or the final ranking at the end of the game.
        Parameters:
        finalUpdate - It's true if the update is to notify the final ranking at the end of the game.
        isForDisconnectionOfThirdPlayer - It's true if the final update is generated because the game is finished for the disconnection of the third player.

      • checkAnyParity

        private void checkAnyParity()
        Checks if counting the damage on the player board of a dead player there are more than one player with the same number of damage on the board.

      • isPassingFromNormalToFrenzyMode

        private boolean isPassingFromNormalToFrenzyMode()
        Checks if the removing skull is the last of the normal mode.
        Returns:
        True if the removing skull is the skull in the position read by file and stored in the relative field of the game (numOfSkullToRemoveToPassToFrenzy), false otherwise.

      • handleEndOfGame

        public void handleEndOfGame(boolean isForDisconnectionOfThirdPlayer)

      • countScoreForKillshoTrack

        private void countScoreForKillshoTrack(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> scoreForDamageInKillShotTrack)
        At the end of the game counts the score for each player according to the number of damage on the killshot track.
        Parameters:
        scoreForDamageInKillShotTrack - The list of the score to give in order to player for the counts of damage on killsho track.

      • countFrequencyOfDamageInKillShotTrack

        private java.util.HashMap<ColorOfFigure_Square,java.lang.Integer> countFrequencyOfDamageInKillShotTrack()
        Gets the frequency of damage for each player on killshot track
        Returns:
        Hash map where the key is the color of figure of the players and the value is the number of the damage of that color on the killshot track

      • convertDamageFromKillshotTrack

        private java.util.ArrayList<ColorOfFigure_Square> convertDamageFromKillshotTrack(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<ColorOfDeathToken>> damageForNormalMode)
        Converts the tokens of death in color of figure to attribute the correct score.
        Parameters:
        damageForNormalMode - It's true if the damage to convert have been token from the killshot track of the normal mode, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        The array list of all the damage converted from tokens of death.

      • convertColorOfTokenInColorOfFigure

        private ColorOfFigure_Square convertColorOfTokenInColorOfFigure(ColorOfDeathToken token)
        Convert token of death in color of figure.
        Parameters:
        token - Color of the token to convert.
        Returns:
        Color of figure relative to the token of death passed by parameter.

      • getFirstOfMaximumColor

        private ColorOfFigure_Square getFirstOfMaximumColor(java.util.ArrayList<ColorOfFigure_Square> colorsWithMaxFrequency,
                                                    java.util.ArrayList<ColorOfFigure_Square> damages)
        Gets the color of the first player that gave the first damage to the dead player.
        Parameters:
        colorsWithMaxFrequency - List of colors that has the same number of damage on the player board of the player.
        damages - List of damage of the player board of the dead player.
        Returns:
        The color of the figure of the player that gave the first damage to the dead player.

      • getColorsWithMaximumFrequency

        private java.util.ArrayList<ColorOfFigure_Square> getColorsWithMaximumFrequency(java.util.HashMap<ColorOfFigure_Square,java.lang.Integer> hashMapForDamage,
                                                                                int max)
        Get the color with the maximum frequency in the hash map passed by parameter.
        Parameters:
        hashMapForDamage - Hash map the contains color of figure as a key and the number of damage of that color on the player board as a value.
        max - Number of the damage of the color that has more damage on the player board.
        Returns:

      • maxIsUnique

        private boolean maxIsUnique(java.util.HashMap<ColorOfFigure_Square,java.lang.Integer> hashMapForDamage,
                            int max)
        Checks if there is only one player with a determinate number of damage given to the dead player.
        Parameters:
        hashMapForDamage - Hash map the contains color of figure as a key and the number of damage of that color on the player board as a value.
        max - Number of the damage of the color that has more damage on the player board.
        Returns:
        True if there is only one player that gave "max" damage to the dead player, false otherwise.

      • findMaxFrequency

        private int findMaxFrequency(java.util.HashMap<ColorOfFigure_Square,java.lang.Integer> hashMapForDamage)
        Gets the maximum frequency of a color of figure among the damage of the dead player.
        Parameters:
        hashMapForDamage - Hash map the contains color of figure as a key and the number of damage of that color on the player board as a value.
        Returns:
        The number of maximum frequency.

      • findColorWithMaxFrequency

                                                       int max)
        Gets the color of figure that has the maximum frequency of damage given on the player board of the dead player.
        Parameters:
        hashMapForDamage - Hash map the contains color of figure as a key and the number of damage of that color on the player board as a value.
        max - Number of the damage of the color that has more damage on the player board.
        Returns:
        The color of figure with the maximum frequency.

      • countFrequencyOfDamageInPlayerBoard

        private java.util.HashMap<ColorOfFigure_Square,java.lang.Integer> countFrequencyOfDamageInPlayerBoard(Player deadPlayer)

        Parameters:
        deadPlayer - The player died.
        Returns:
        Hash map the contains color of figure as a key and the number of damage of that color on the player board as a value.

      • findIndexOfPlayerOfThisColor

        private int findIndexOfPlayerOfThisColor(ColorOfFigure_Square color)
        Find the position of a player on the list of players of the game according with his color.
        Parameters:
        color - The color of figure of the player on whose is interested on the position in the list of player of the game.
        Returns:
        The position of the player with the color passed by parameter in the list of players of the game.
